who is ms dhoni

Mahendra Singh Dhoni, commonly known as MS Dhoni, is a former Indian international cricketer who served as the captain of the Indian national team in limited-overs formats from 2007 to 2016 and in Test cricket from 2008 to 2014.
best team in ipl
Mumbai Indians is the most successful team in the Indian Premier League (IPL), having won the title five times: 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019, and 2020.
best indian capptian
According to various cricket experts and fans, Mahendra Singh Dhoni is often regarded as one of the best captains in Indian cricket history.
finn balor?
Finn Bálor is an Irish professional wrestler currently signed to WWE, performing on the NXT brand. He is a two-time NXT Champion and a former WWE Intercontinental Champion.

who is ms dhoni

Mahendra Singh Dhoni is an Indian professional cricketer who plays as a right-handed batter and a wicket-keeper. Widely regarded as one of the most prolific cricketers in Indian cricket history, he has led the Indian national team to numerous victories and has been one of the most successful captains in Indian cricket.
who is thala

"Thala" is a Tamil word that means "head" or "leader". In the context of Indian cricket, MS Dhoni is often referred to as "Thala" by his fans, particularly in Chennai, where he has played for the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
